alert.note: Alert for Benton; Madison (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 11 at 11:21PM CST until January 11 at 11:45PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN BENTON...NORTHERN MADISON...WESTERN CARROLL AND NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 1120 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles west of Washburn to 3 miles east of Lowell to near Greenland, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Berryville... Huntsville... Eureka Springs... Bella Vista... Lowell... Farmington... Pea Ridge... Holiday Island... Elkins... Tontitown... West Fork... Cave Springs... Greenland... Gateway... Beaver... Hindsville... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 52 and 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tulsa.
